name: Lostinspace
description:
Quick! Your spaceship has been corrupted with a virus. You’re stuck in space and have no navigation to get back home. Use the simulation to delete the virus. Use arrow keys to move, and the space bar to shoot. Remember, don’t touch the enemy, or their bullet. Pick up powerups and bandages to keep yourself alive. The common way to winning a game isn’t real in this simulation, try to find the trick!

 

Move up: Up arrow

Move down: Down arrow

Move right: Right arrow

Move left: Left arrow

 Shoot: Space Bar

 Mushroom: Shield

Chili: Speed boost

Upgrade star: Upgrades weapon

Bandage: +1 Health

Med kit: +3 Health

Items & Mobs:

 Blackholes: Spawns Mice Bots

 Mice Bots: Small, quick, straightforward machines.

 Airliner: A machine that has a circle as a body and a tail.

 UFO: The unidentified flying object everyone’s been talking about…

 The Big One: You’ll find out what it does later, don’t be overexcited.

 Shield Mushroom: Shields you from attacks for a short period of time

 Speed Chili: Allows you to go Hyper speed after consuming it.

 Upgrade Star: Splits your attacks to make them more powerful.

 Bandage & Med kits: Heals you, one heals for one hitpoint, the other heals for three.
